name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pointis - Intelligent Notes for the AI Era

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarization, transcribing, note-taking, and content capture on every page. Automatically organized and easily searchable.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Pointis, you can focus on what's important instead of how to remember it. Capture content with one click and get personalized answers based on your data.

Key features include:

- Summaries of websites, YouTube videos, articles, and emails
- Transcriptions of meetings
- Note-taking and Illustration tools
- Files support
- AI-generated answers based on your data
- Desktop applications for Mac, Windows, and Linux
- Integration with 10+ AI models

Visit our home page to learn more: https://pnt.is/
Suggestions & Feedback are most welcome.
